ref.mixed-citation: Zimbelman R, Rhoads R, Rhoads M, Duff G, Baumgard L, Collier R. A re-evaluation of the impact of temperature humidity index (THI) and black globe humidity index (BGHI) on milk production in high producing dairy cows. Proceedings of the Southwest Nutrition and Management Conference; 2009 Feb 26–27; Arizona, USA; 2009. p. 158–168.
